content:
1. Nishdtayil ni-nne petta
paavana kanyakayotoppam
naathaa! Devaa! Nalkuka yogyatha nin sthuthi paataan

2. Munnam nin-aagamanam
cholliya nal nibiyarotoppam
naathaa! Devaa!...

3. Dandana pee-dakaletta
sahadaa moudyaanarumoppam
naathaa! Devaa!...

5. Parumala maar greegoriyosu
deevannaasyosu ivaroppam
naathaa! Devaa!...

7. Vishvaasatthaal parudeesaa
neeyaruliya moshtaavoppam
naathaa devaa! ...

8. Anavaratha sthuthi thalpararaam ambaradoothanmaaroppam
naathaa! Devaa!...

items.content: /tjanam:- kaarunyavaanaaya kartthaave! Njangalotu karu na cheythu njangale sahaayikkaname.

/tanaadyanthanum, sakalatthinteyum nirmmaathaavumaaya dyvame! Ninakku sthuthi. Nin്re svaroopatthil nee manu shyane srushticchu. Avan paapamcheythu veenupoya thin്re shesham ezhunnettu varuvaanum, sakalatthinteyum adhikaariyum sakalattheyum parishodhikkunnavanum neeyaakunnuvennu arinju nin്re atukkalekku thiri yunnathinum, avan്re santhaanangal nashtappettupokaa thirikkunnathinumaayi avanu nee acchaaram nalki. Dyvame! Ippol njangalute sankatashabdam kelkkana me. Ninakku ee neratthum ellaa perunnaalukalilum, nerangalilum, kaalangalilum, njangalute aayushkaalasleebaamokkeyilum, sthuthiyum bahumaanavum njangal samarppikkum. Bkulahun yaummo aammeen.

athyulkrushta parimalavaasanayaayirikkunna kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi, ninakku sthothram. Naathaa! Ninte kalpanayaal agniyil urukkappettu ninte dyva thvatthinu dhoopamaayi samarppikkappetuvaan, bhoomiyilninnu nalla aushadhangaleyum parimalavarggangaleyum nee ulavaa kki, ava ninakkaavashyamaayittalla; ennaalo njangalute parimaladhoopam moolam njangalkku paapaparihaaramundaa kkuvaan njangalute aavashyatthinaayittathre. Kartthaave! Nin്re karunayaalum dayayaalum njangalute sthotha ngaleyum praarththanakaleyum, nin്re preethikkum njanga lute punyatthinumaayi kykkollaname. Njangalute ee dhoopam nin്re pallikalkkum bhavanangalkkum dayaraa kalkkum vendiyum, purohithanmaarkkum balipeedta ngalkkum vendiyum ninte bahumaanaarththam samarppi kkappetunnu. Randaamatthe svarggamaayittheernna, ninne vahiccha nirmmalayum shuddhimathiyum aayirikkunna ninte maathaavaaya kanyaka martthamariyaamin്re apekshakal moola vum, deerghadarshimaaruteyum shleehanmaaruteyum, sahade nmaaruteyum, moudyaananmaaruteyum brahmachaarikaluteyum, vineethanmaaruteyum, nompukaaruteyum, vilaapakkaaru teyum, vrathakkaaruteyum praarththanakal moolavum, njanga lotu krupa cheyyaname. Nin്re thirushareera rakthangalil sambandhicchu, ninte prathyaashayil nidrapraapicchirikkunna vishvaasikalaaya njangalute maricchupoyavarkku nalla aashvaasavum mahattharamaaya punaruththaanavum nalkana me. Njangalum avarum nin്re valathubhaagatthuninnu ninte kaarunyam kandu, ninakkum, nin്re pithaavinum, vishuddha roohaaykkum, ippozhumellaayppozhum sthuthiyum, sthothravum samarppikkumaaraakaname. Hosho

content: dyvatthilninnu katangalkku parihaaravum, paapangalkku mochanavum, randu lokangalilum ennekkum naam kykkollumaaraakatte. Aammeen.

krupa cheyyaname, naathaa! Krupa cheyyaname.
1. Devaadheeshaa!! Naathaa! Thirumumpil
njangalanacchoree - parimaladhoopatthaal paapam
neekkaname pizha pokkaname.
Sleebaayaal rakshicchavanaam
jeevasuthaa! Karunaadivase
nin valamaayu njangale nirtthaname.

2. Nayanaagocharamaam - uyaratthil ninnum
ninmaahaathmyatthe thaazhtthi svahithatthaal naranaayu
durbbalaraamaadaamyarute
aadhi vyaadhikale theertthon
thaathajane svayamudbhuthaa!
Sthuthi naathaa! Thava maanam dhanyam.

3. Seenaayu giri nin - savidhe vira poondu.
Naathaa! Deveshaa! - giri vaaridhi dharanaam ninne
kanyakayaam mariyaamenthi
vezhchpetaathaval garbhiniyaayu,
vachanaatheetham prasavicchu.
Thalsmruthiye-vishruthamaakkaname.

4. Kanyakamariyaame! - shlommo ninnotu cho-
nnathyunnathaduthan - nee perum raajeshvarane
prasaviccheetum vezhchavinaa
srushtikal than prabhayaam raviye
vaazhvezhumamme! Kanyakayaayu
prasavicchol nee saubhaagyavathi.

5. Unnatharaajyamathum - shaashvathajeevithavum
nirmmalaraarjjikkum - satthamamashihaa bhakthanmaa-
rarhikkunna mahaabhaagyam
jadanethram darshikkukayo
shravanam kelkkukayo hrudayam
therukayo cheythittillethum.

6. Sahaderothunnu,- supriya shuddhasuthan
svakaraajyo njangal kkekeetum muti shaashvathavum
prathidaanam samrakshithavum
eritheevaal marddhithar njangal-
kkaashvaasam mashihaayishtar-
kkaruliyathaam parudeesayilekum.

7. Mannavane! Mashihaa! Sathatham' thavakarunaa-
vaathilil muttunnen - dhanikaa nin nidhinilayatthee-
nnekaname krupayum vaazhvum,
neeyen gathi, thunacheyyuka nin
saakshiye lajjithanaakkaruthe,
sharanavumen-aashrayavum neeye.

8. Raajyatthin vaathil - cheriyathumaa maarggam
veethi kuranjathumaa-naavazhi gamanam kaamkshippo-
nathyuthsaahamavashyam thaan.
Alasatha lesham baadhicchaal
ashubhavazhikku vashamvadanaayu
svaathmatthe-svayame nihanikkum

9. Mashihaayute roolmaa - maamodeesaayaal
sampraapicchoraayu - thruppaavana thanu bhakshicchu
punyaninam paanam cheythor
puzhiyil ninnum thaan moolam
praananoteri dhooli kuta-
njathi thejo-vasthram chaarttheetum.

items.content: /tthan്re varavine munnariyippaan pravaachakanmaareyum, than്re avathaaratthinu kanyakamariyaamineyum, rakshaakaravum jeevan nalkunnathumaaya suvishesham prasamgippaan shleehanmaareyum, ariyippukaareyum, vishvaasasthireekaranatthinuvendi rakthasaakshikalaakuvaan sahade nmaareyum, thirusabhaye samrakshicchu bharippaan purohi thanmaareyum, theranjetuttha dyvame! Avarute ormma divasam ayogyaraaya njangal nin്re thirusannidhiyil samarppikkunna dhoopam kykkollaname. Avarute praarththana mukhaantharam lokatthil samaadhaanavum, thiru sabhaykku abhivruddhiyum, sabhaamgangalkku parishuddhajeevi thavum kyvarutthaname. Njangal avarute praarththana yil aashrayicchukondu, vishvaasasthirathayote jeeva paryantham punyaparisheelanatthil jeevikkumaaraakaname. Njangalum njangalute maricchupoyavarum, nin്re parishuddha nmaarotonnicchu ninre mokshatthil aanandicchu nina kkennum sthuthi paatumaaraakaname. Hosho ... Aammeen

content:
rujumathikalkkirulil dyuthi ulavaayi
1. Dyuthi udayam-cheythen kartthaave!
Koorirul neengumpol ninne
kuppunnu-gaganam-dhara'yennee
druthamundaayoru sodarimaar
/tneerinmeethe vaanitamo-
/tnnaparam neerinnaadhaaram
/tnimishamuyarnnoru manavarayaam
oyaaraayathamaayu maddhye
sthuthyam srushtividhaanam the.

2. Nirmmalamaam-udare nirmmalamaayu
vannu vasicchoru nirmmalanaam
aathmajane-preshippicchavanaam
nirmmalathaathan samsthuthyan.
/tthan saamyam naam poondituvaan
/tnammute saamyamavan poondu;
/tnamme than pithrusutharaakki
paavanaroohaayotu cherppaan
maanavaroopam svayamettaan.

3. Praarththippaan dyvatthin mumpil
mariyaam ninneetunnera-
tthagnijvaalaavruthanaam doothan
savidhe chennura cheythevam.
/traajathanujan mevumathaam
/tmanimandirame shlommo the,
/tninnilamarnneetum dhanavaan
kshaamam janathaykkaattituvaan
ninnagathithvam maayicchaan.

4. Bhaagyanidhee! Mariyaame! Dyva-
praanaathmajane pettole!
Bhaagyanidhee! Vaanijanaavaasam
cheythoru bhooshithamaam nouke!
/tambarashilpiye ettenthi
/tvrathashuddhyaa pettoramale!
/tnisthulamaam manimandirame!
Bhaagyam the, ninnil jaatham
cheythonaam naathan dhanyan.

5. 'njaan sathya-prabha' ennutayon than
anthevaasikalotothi;
iprabhayil-chernnu natappone
irul piti kootaa, mashihaa than
/tprabhayil chernnu natannoraam
/tshleehanmaarkkathi soubhaagyam
/tkandaalum thal smruthiyengum
kondaateetunnathighosham
thal praarththana nammalkkabhayam.

6. Jeevakaram mruthikaramennevam
kandirusaranikal sahadenmaar
noothanamaam-jeevithamaarjjippaan;
durghatamaarggam kaamkshicchaar;
/tdushtaathmaavotu patavetti
/tjayamoteri parayunnu:
/taavashyakkaarkkaashrayavum
bhakthanmaarkkanugaamiyumaam
kartthaavin naamam dhanyam.

7. Kshemamota-ngezhunnalluka saakshaal
itayaa! Pandithanaayakane!
Keeppaa pol sabha thannaadhaaram!
Muttum paulosinu samane!
/tnibi nivahatthin priya sahajaa!
/tapposthola samoohasthaa!
/teliyaa polujjuvalane!
Yoohaanonpol vrathaparane!
Ninne varicchoru sabha dhanya.

alivotu krupa cheyyuka naathaa!
8. Aahvaanam-cheyyum paapikalil
krupaye vilakkaatthon devaa!
Aardrathayaal kopatthin vatiyum
thaadanavum neekkeetaname.
/taanandeshvaryangalezhum
/tmaasaabdangale nalkaname.
/tsleebaayute van rushmaayaal
viddhuvamsikkuka dushtane nin
aardrathaye vaazhtthum njangal.

9. Nin sthuthiyum-haaleluyyaayum
kartthaave! Njaan nirttharuthe;
vidhi neethi-kkayyo cheyyaruthe;
njaan paathakiyennariyunnen,
/tsarvva katangalumaaraanjaal
/tnarakam thaanennavakaasham
/tninne vilippaan kazhivenye
mounam mruthiyaal njaan pookum
neekkuka krupayaalenpaapam.

10. Aashvaasam-smruthiyotu mrutha thaatha
bhraathaakkal kkekeetaname
nirtthaname-thaavaka poojakare
parishuddhanmaarute nirayil
/tsimhaasana samsthithanaayu nee
/tsatthamare thirayunneram
/tvidhinilaye daya kandetthi
thaavaka mahimodaya divase
nin valamaayavar nilkkaname.

ninnaal sthuthiyotu raajamakal-haa-haa
nin valamaayu raajabhaaminiyum.
/tnayavaan pana pole thalirtthitume haa-haa
/tvalarumavan lebanon kaarakil pol.
Makkalilappan krupa cheythu pole-haa-haa
bhakthanmaaril dyvam krupa cheyyum.

sthuthi dyvatthinnuyaratthil
than maathaavinnunnathiyum
mahimaamuti sahadenmaarkkum
mrutharil karunayumundaaka.

thaathan shlommo gabreeyel
moolam meleennaa dhanya
/tmariyaaminu nalkappettu
/tthee poondon vaayil thingum shlommo chonnaan naathan nin
koote thannudayam ninnil.

shlommo than nibiyanmaarkkum
shlommo than shleehanmaarkkum
/t shlommo shlemmo naathankal
/tkoorerum sahadenmaarkkum
shlommo than makkal vasikkum
parishuddhasabhaykkum shlommo.

naam dyvasuthanmaaraavaan
aayushkaalatthilcholli-
/ttthannetthaathare orkkenam
/tnayavaanmaarpunyappetto-
ronnicchekumavarkkaashvaa-
sam svargge puthrandyvam.

1. Maathruvishuddha,mruthisambandham-nalkuka naathaa!
Thal praarththanayaal punyamivarkkum mrutharaayorkkum.

2 bhaagyavathee! Mariyaame! Nizhalaay-mooshapaninja
pettiyathaal nee chithreekruthayaay-gooddaarththatthil.

3. Pettikkullil dyvikamaayo-retukal pole
nyastham ninnil sathyam mariyaam-jeevanapoopam'.

6. Daaveedinputhriyil ninnum mey-poondoru puthraa!
Nin krupa paaram varshikkanamee-itavakayinmel.

shuddhan nee aaloho! Haaleluyyaa
shuddhan nee balavaane! Kuriyelaayison
shuddhan nee mruthiheenaa!+krooshettone krupa cheytheetaname

kartthaave! Krupa cheyyaname-haaleluyyaa
kartthaave! Krupa cheyu kanivaal-kuriyelaayison
kartthaave! Karmmaarththanakale ettittavayaal krupa cheytheetaname.
Sthuthyan nee aaloho! Haaleluyyaa
sthuthyan nee srashtaave! Kuriyelaayison
sthuthyan nee paapikalatiyaaril-krupa cheytheetum mashihaa-raajaave!
